thread.title: InventHelp Inventor Designs Computer/Cell Phone With a More Versatile Look (BGF-919)
thread.title_full: InventHelp Inventor Designs Computer/Cell Phone With a More Versatile Look (BGF-919) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: InventHelp Inventor Designs Computer/Cell Phone With a More Versatile Look (BGF-919)
text:
Pittsburgh-based InventHelp is working to submit the CAMELEON COMPUTER/PHONE to companies for their review.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 18, 2015
An inventor from Kalamazoo, Mich., "After considering how I and other people buy computers and computer cases for their different looks I decided that there needs to be an alternative way to make computers stand out aesthetically," he said.
The aesthetic and stylish CAMELEON COMPUTER/PHONE has a dynamic appearance. It grabs attention differently than conventional models and allows for a versatile look. It also provides a new way to project images and text.
The original design was submitted to the Bingham Farms office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-BGF-919, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
